meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sheri Boysen Mike Malaier David Schuman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6443.

td.p: Sheri Boysen, a stay-at-home mom from Houston, Texas
Mike Malaier, an attorney from Tacoma, Washington
David Schuman, a communications and economics student originally from Ardsley, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,300)

tr.td: IN THE POLITICAL ARENA
CLEAN OUT YOUR CLOSET
MUSEUMS
WHAT YEAR WAS THAT?
THE NON -ED PAST PARTICIPLE
BIG CHECKS
(Alex: ...which you're hoping to receive at the end of the show.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Have too many sweaters? Contact the org. named for this late cardigan-wearing kids\' TV host to find a sweater drive')
